title: Fix for ppc64le jit graph difference in sigmoid backward, see #10726
body_html: As reported in Issue #10726, the jit compiler, when running on ppc64le, may produce an isomorphic output but fail a diff test against the expected output file. The expected output file is created from a test that was ran on x86_64. This ensures that if ppc64le test output is different, the output is instead compared to an expected output file created when the test is run on a ppc64le system.
